nodes.description: 1985年4月9日黎巴嫩女性Sana Mheidali执行首次已知女性自杀袭击，袭击以色列士兵
nodes.support_text: Sana'a Mehaidli, a member of the Syrian Social Nationalist Party (SSNP), detonated an explosive-laden vehicle, which killed two Israeli soldiers and injured two more.

nodes.description: 2005年5月起统计显示女性自杀袭击占比2%，造成107人死亡
nodes.support_text: Women have been responsible for 14 of 667 suicide attacks since May 2005, or 2 percent. They have caused at least 107 deaths, or 5 percent of the 2,065 people killed during this time period.

nodes.description: 2005年11月9日伊拉克女性Sajida al-Rishawi在约旦失败引爆自杀炸弹
nodes.support_text: Sajida al-Rishawi... tried unsuccessfully to detonate her explosives belt in an Amman, Jordan hotel on Nov. 9. 2005.

nodes.description: 2005年12月7日伊拉克迪亚拉省女性自杀袭击造成15人死亡
nodes.support_text: On Dec. 7, a woman attacked the offices of a Diyala-based Sunni group fighting al-Qaida in Iraq, killing 15 people and wounding 35.
even as Iraqi casualties are down by 55 percent nationwide since June 2007, according to an AP count.

nodes.description: 2008年1月4日MSBC报道指出女性自杀袭击激增
nodes.support_text: It goes against religious taboos in Iraq to involve women in fighting, but three recent suicide bombings carried out by women could indicate insurgents are growing increasingly desperate.

nodes.description: 2008年10月美军在巴格达郊区培训20名女性安保人员
nodes.support_text: We know it's a tactic that al-Qaida in Iraq is trying to use,

nodes.description: 2008年11月4日迪亚拉省女性袭击美军造成12人受伤
nodes.support_text: On Nov. 4, a woman detonated an explosives vest next to a U.S. patrol in Diyala's regional capital, Baqouba, 35 miles northeast of Baghdad, wounding seven U.S. troops and five Iraqis.

nodes.description: 2008年12月7日迪亚拉省女性袭击逊尼派组织致18人死亡
nodes.support_text: On Dec. 7, a woman attacked the offices of a Diyala-based Sunni group fighting al-Qaida in Iraq, killing 15 people and wounding 35.

nodes.description: 2008年12月31日巴古拜市女性袭击警察导致9人受伤
nodes.support_text: on Dec. 31, a bomber in Baqouba detonated her suicide vest close to a police patrol, wounding five policemen and four civilians.

nodes.description: 2008年12月美军逮捕3名涉训女性自杀袭击者
nodes.support_text: There are no military reports before August indicating suspicion of al-Qaida in Iraq training women attackers. The first known suicide attack by a woman was carried out in Lebanon on April 9, 1985.
